DataElement.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System Adult Rating Form Communication Skills Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the scaled score for Communication Skills in the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System Adult Form.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Adult Rating Form Communication Skills Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 16 to 89 years that is used to evaluate adults with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by family members, professional caregivers, supervisors, or the individual._An assessment of the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System where communication skills such as speech, language, listening, and conversation are evaluated._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Adult Rating Form Communication Skills
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 16 to 89 years that is used to evaluate adults with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by family members, professional caregivers, supervisors, or the individual.:An assessment of the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System where communication skills such as speech, language, listening, and conversation are evaluated.

Concepts.longName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Adult Rating Form
Concepts.definition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 16 to 89 years that is used to evaluate adults with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by family members, professional caregivers, supervisors, or the individual.
An assessment of the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Second Edition where communication skills such as speech, language, listening, and conversation are evaluated.

Property.preferredDefinition: Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

Concepts.definition: Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of a raw score to a common scale from the  Adaptive Behavior Assessment System.
